snippet: The State Senate voted 37 to 4 on Wednesday to ban a common second-trimester abortion procedure that critics describe as dismembering a fetus.
abstract: Oklahoma Senate passes bill banning procedure commonly used in second-trimester abortions; Republican Gov Mary Fallin is likely to sign bill into law.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate voted 37 to 4 on Wednesday to ban a common second-trimester abortion procedure that critics describe as dismembering a fetus.
